project_name: Railway Wallet - Private DeFi on Rails
description: Railway is a private DeFi wallet powered by the RAILGUN privacy network that uses advanced zkSNARKs technology to enable untraceable ERC-20 token transactions across Ethereum, Arbitrum, Polygon, BSC, and other chains. Users can shield tokens for complete transaction privacy, interact with public DeFi platforms (swaps, yield farming, liquidity provision) from private 0zk addresses, and maintain encrypted wallet data stored only locally with zero activity logs. The wallet includes compliance features like Viewing Keys, Private Proofs of Innocence (Privacy Pools), and tax reporting tools, available on desktop, iOS, and Android.

description.value: Railway Wallet demonstrates a well-architected multi-platform application with strong privacy integration through the RAILGUN Protocol. The codebase shows good separation of concerns, excellent TypeScript configuration, and effective code reuse across platforms. However, it suffers from a critical lack of automated testing, insufficient documentation, and some maintainability issues from overly large files. The security model is sound with proper key isolation and encrypted storage, but the project would benefit from formal security audits and automated dependency scanning.

mobile_architecture.description: Cross-platform mobile application with embedded Node.js runtime for cryptographic operations

desktop_architecture.description: Cross-platform desktop application for Mac, Windows, and Linux

blockchain_sdk.name: RAILGUN Wallet SDK
blockchain_sdk.description: SDK library to develop RAILGUN-powered wallets with privacy features

railgun_wallet_sdk.purpose: Shield ERC-20 tokens/NFTs, manage shielded balances, private transfers, private smart contract interactions

railgun_engine.purpose: JavaScript library to interact with RAILGUN smart contracts

zk_snark.circuits: 54 distinct circuits for various transaction types

poseidon.purpose: Encrypt UTXOs and obscure user/transaction data
poseidon.usage: SNARK-friendly hash function optimized for EVM execution

zero_knowledge_proofs.scheme: zk-SNARKs (Zero-Knowledge Succinct Non-Interactive Argument of Knowledge)
zero_knowledge_proofs.circuit_setup: Trusted setup ceremony (Common Reference String generation)
zero_knowledge_proofs.cryptographic_foundation: Elliptic curve cryptography for succinct proofs

shielding_mechanism.process: Shield existing ERC-20 tokens/NFTs into private 0zk address

merkle_tree.shared_tree: All tokens share the same Merkle tree
merkle_tree.optimization: EVM-optimized Poseidon implementation (v3) for reduced gas costs

private_sends.description: Valid blockchain transactions that transfer value without revealing details

private_defi.liquidity: Maintains liquidity on original blockchain (no bridges)

utxo_model.merkle_structure: UTXOs arranged in private Merkle Tree

private_proofs_of_innocence.name: Private POI (Privacy Pools)
private_proofs_of_innocence.description: Zero-Knowledge proof system for cryptographic assurance of fund origin
private_proofs_of_innocence.mechanism: Users create ZK proof that funds are not part of publicly known undesirable transactions
private_proofs_of_innocence.impact: Enables regulatory compliance without sacrificing privacy

tax_reporting.privacy: Maintains transaction privacy while enabling compliance

privacy_guarantees.token_type_privacy: Token types not revealed in transactions
privacy_guarantees.anonymity_set: All RAILGUN users share same anonymity set
privacy_guarantees.no_bridges: Direct on-chain privacy without bridge risks

broadcaster_network.purpose: Submit transactions without revealing user IP/origin

data_collection.data_sharing: No user data sent to developers or third parties

project_description: Railway is a private DeFi wallet powered by the RAILGUN privacy network that uses advanced zkSNARKs technology to enable untraceable ERC-20 token transactions across Ethereum, Arbitrum, Polygon, BSC, and other chains. Users can shield tokens for complete transaction privacy, interact with public DeFi platforms (swaps, yield farming, liquidity provision) from private 0zk addresses, and maintain encrypted wallet data stored only locally with zero activity logs. The wallet includes compliance features like Viewing Keys, Private Proofs of Innocence (Privacy Pools), and tax reporting tools, available on desktop, iOS, and Android.
